text: The 2010 Seniors Torneo Godó was the fifth edition of the Seniors Torneo Godó and it took place from April 16–18, 2010. Tie-breaks were used for the first two sets of each match, which was the best of three sets. If the score was tied at one set all, a 'Champions Tie-break' (the first player to win at least 10 points or by a margin of two points) would be used. Félix Mantilla was the defending champion, but did not compete this year. Goran Ivanišević won the title by defeating Thomas Enqvist 6–4, 6–4 in the final. ==Draw== The main draw was announced on 24 March. The order of play was revealed in early April. * Joan Balcells * Sergi Bruguera * Thomas Enqvist * Wayne Ferreira * Goran Ivanišević * Mikael Pernfors ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== ====Group B==== ===Final Four=== ====3rd Place Play-Off==== ====Final==== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Barcelona Open (tennis) Torneo Godo, Seniors Godo
title: 2010 Seniors Torneo Godó
